title._content: [Dr. Frederick Kellogg Hollister house, Lily Pond Lane, East Hampton, New York. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. [Dr. Frederick Kellogg Hollister house, Lily Pond Lane, East Hampton, New York. View from house to garden] [ca. 1915] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House Architecture: Albro & Lindeberg, 1908. Landscape: Harriet Shelton (Mrs. Frederick K.) Hollister. Today: House but not garden extant. On slide: Blind embossed stamp "Frances B. Johnston, New York." Photographed when Frances Benjamin Johnston and Mattie Edwards Hewitt worked together. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16867 Call Number: LC-J717-X109- 62
